definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc

sentences.english: Other leisure activities: Several other leisure activities represent serious competition for social board and card games.
sentences.chinese: 一些其它休閒活動也在搶奪桌遊和卡牌遊戲人口。

sentences.english: If you are willing to come, what time do you prefer to come?
sentences.chinese: 如果您願意來，你比較喜歡在哪個時段來玩桌遊？

to make friends/to meet friends/member of the same organization

live (e.g. broadcast or recording)/what is actually happening/scene/the real situation
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
